name: Sharob ABDUL-AZIZ, petitioner, v. Michelle RICCI, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Sharob ABDUL-AZIZ, petitioner,
v.
Michelle RICCI, et al.

opinions.text: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperisand petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit for further consideration in light of Holt v. Hobbs,575 U.S. ----, 135 S.Ct. 853, 190 L.Ed.2d 747 (2015).

casebody.head_matter:
Sharob ABDUL-AZIZ, petitioner,
v.
Michelle RICCI, et al.
No. 14-7915.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 8, 2015.
Opinion
